original_text: If you live like this, you will show that you really are children of your Father above. God is kind to everyone. He causes the sun to shine on everyone, both good people and bad people. He also causes the rain to fall on everyone, people who obey him and people who do not obey him.
korean_text: 이같이 한즉 하늘에 계신 너희 아버지의 아들이 되리니 이는 하나님이 그 해를 악인과 선인에게 비추시며 비를 의로운 자와 불의한 자에게 내려주심이라

sentences.original_text: you will show that you really are children of your Father above
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 정말로 하늘에 계신 아버지의 자녀임을 보여줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He causes the sun to shine on everyone
both good people and bad people
He also causes the rain to fall on everyone
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 또한 모두에게 비가 내리게 하십니다

sentences.original_text: and people who do not obey him
